mainText:
I just got my first computer at 38 yrs old last Halloween.  I wanted to 
get a quality computer and always heard that Apple was the top of the 
line.  After a year working with it,  I understand just what people 
meant by it being the best.  I just want to say thanks because it is 
opening up doors that I didn't know existed in the most positive ways. 
Anything is possible is an understatement.
author: Steve
